message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split is fair considering the rate of inflation we face.
Considering the inflation rates, I believe this offer is more reasonable. Let's settle on this before the money loses more value.

The gap in our inflation rates is significant, impacting the value of our gains differently. I'm willing to compromise but still reflect this disparity.
